name: Khusbu
wishText: Bahut Mehnat Laga Hai isme, I hope tumko pasand aaye ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy Bday blah blah...
text2: Maine Pahle yahi socha ki aisa message karke sojau
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, toh khush rehna hamesha jaisa rehti ho
